title: Glued spaces and lower curvature bounds
abstract:
In this short note we survey theorems and provide conjectures on gluing
constructions under lower curvature bounds in smooth and non-smooth context.
Focusing on synthetic lower Ricci curvature bounds we consider Riemannian
manifolds, weighted Riemannian manifolds, Alexandrov spaces, collapsed and
non-collapsed $RCD$ spaces, and sub-Riemannian spaces.
